sys_hub_flow.name: NeedIt autoclose friday

sys_element_mapping.value: Needit task {{5b18ed58-2304-4a0e-981a-c193ca06b284.item.number}}﻿ was automatically closed because its due date {{5b18ed58-2304-4a0e-981a-c193ca06b284.item.due_date}} is overdue than the property mention {{9f55378d-cd28-4128-b9fb-394636acc0fe.property_value}}﻿ days
